summary: This is an email from JPMorgan Chase's Secure Content Delivery Portal transmitting documents in response to a subpoena request related to Ghislaine Maxwell. The email contains two attached PDF files and provides instructions for accessing them securely.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subpoena referenced in the email is specifically named for Ghislaine Maxwell, indicating she is the subject of the records request.

events.title: JPMorgan Chase responds to subpoena for Ghislaine Maxwell records
events.description: JPMorgan Chase's Secure Content Delivery Portal sends an email with attached documents fulfilling a subpoena request related to Ghislaine Maxwell.

locations: 270 Park Ave., New York, NY 10017 (JPMorgan Chase headquarters)
keyFacts: JPMorgan Chase responded to a subpoena (Case ID SB1062192-FI) specifically for records related to Ghislaine Maxwell.
The response was delivered via a secure portal on October 3, 2019, with two attached PDF files.
The document shows financial institutions were being subpoenaed for information about Maxwell as part of an investigation.
The email emphasizes confidentiality and secure handling of the transmitted documents.
The correspondence originated from JPMorgan Chase's headquarters at 270 Park Avenue in New York.
